com.box.sdk

Class ProgressInputStream

  • Object
    • InputStream
      • ProgressInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class ProgressInputStream
extends InputStream
    An InputStream that can report the progress of reading from another InputStream to a ProgressListener.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProgressInputStream(InputStream stream, ProgressListener listener, long total)
      Constructs a ProgressInputStream that wraps another InputStream.

      • ProgressInputStream

        public ProgressInputStream(InputStream stream,
                   ProgressListener listener,
                   long total)
        Constructs a ProgressInputStream that wraps another InputStream.
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream whose progress will be monitored.
        listener - the listener that will receive progress updates.
        total - the total number of bytes that are expected to be read from the stream.
